What is BIP119, and why is it so controversial? 
https://twitter.com/econoalchemist/status/1518432079939309570?t=wIi0FcfoiYbeBBr_zNgr1A&s=19
https://twitter.com/francispouliot_/status/1517540087638237186?t=M_YWmozqo4LQIvlEFCcuCA&s=19
The BIP itself:
https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0119.mediawiki
Layman's terms: CTV restricts the ways in which funds can be spend by introducing "vaults." It prevents someone from having access to an entire wallet of funds at once. Imagine you want to withdraw 100k sats for your months expenses and only have access to withdraw that 100k, there is no way to easily do that right now. With vaults, this becomes possible.
https://www.bip119.com/
